text.quote: 000: Clause 37, leave out Clause 37 and insert the following new Clause—
text.IndentTwo: (i) for the purposes of reducing demand for electricity; and
(ii) wholly or partly for the purpose of determining provision to be included in electricity capacity regulations; and
text.IndentOne: (b) make arrangements for the purpose of piloting a measure (or measures) to secure a reduction in the demand for electricity.
text.quote: (2) Arrangements under this section may be paid for either by money provided by Parliament or by means established for the provision of capacity agreements in section 22 and 24.”
